meta.title: From YO LA to TENGO
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: [This week](/2025/04/01), I'm building Raddles around acts we saw at Big Ears. [Yo La Tengo](https://matadorrecords.com/pages/artists/yo-la-tengo) played twice, once alone, and once with the jazz legends of the [Sun Ra Arkestra](https://open.spotify.com/artist/5V5vvh5MgM7vDuPp4lJYkh), which we got to see. They went back and forth playing each other's songs, blending rock and jazz, mellow and bombastic, high and low. It was an unexpected treat.

ladder.clue: Change one letter (and remove space) in <> to get a common hashtag
What the last letter of <> stands for
TV show with a character named <>
Add an honorific to <> to get a superhero
What the last letter of <> stands for, in shipping
The last three letters of <>, when anagrammed, spell this crop
Three steps before <>, in a certain alphabet
Change second letter of <> to get a Spanish verb
